overview:
Dean Cruse is the VP of Marketing at FiveRuns.

Dean has been leading marketing teams for software and Internet companies for over 24 years now, and has become even more passionate about marketing in the Ruby on Rails space. In addition to running point on all of FiveRuns inbound marketing and outbound business development efforts, Dean leads the company’s charge in using social media technologies and other communications tools to build digital relationships with the Rails community.
